integrations.title: Setup & Integrations
integrations.subtitle: Choose the integration that's right for you
integrations.channelIntegrationsDesc: Connect your communication channels to receive and respond to messages from customers.
integrations.websiteWidgetDesc: Add the code below to your website to enable the chatbox.
integrations.followSteps: Follow these steps to add the chatbox to your website
integrations.addCodeToPage: 2. Add the code in your page
integrations.pasteCodeDesc: Paste the chatbox code above in your page's HTML head section. You can add it anywhere in the HTML head.
